duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze the effectiveness of a recently implemented tool and recommend enhancements.
Develop instructions for end-users on tool usage.
Design and build visualizations, reports, and dashboards to provide insights into data, trends, forecast changes, and KPIs tied to Demand Planning.
Propose whether to keep the current platform/system or change the tool (e.g., move everything to Power BI).
Collaborate with internal stakeholders to identify key metrics and data sources for dashboards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Data Analysis, Business, or a related field (Master’s preferred)
